Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Cute little spot with simple, traditional breakfast/brunch. Everything tasted fresh and homemade, from the eggs to the bread, the delicious jams, the coffee, fresh-pressed orange juice. Would definitely eat here again.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Just tried the lemon jam! Its amazing! Everything is really tasty in a cozy place.. perfect brunch/breakfast in Amsterdam.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: So delicious!! You can Taste that everything is selfmade and so good! Especially on the table there‚Äôre several of homemade Marmelade. Thank God, there‚Äôs the offer to buy them for home. The owner is very Kind, friendly and attentiv! At the end We had to order more of the Tasty Croissants.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: super nice atmosphere. friendly staff, alamzing breakfast options. Loved it!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best coffee in Amsterdam! Tost was amazing, so tasty!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: I always love the bakkerswinkel, especially the one at the oud zuid. As someone who loves baking, i found their cheesecake really top notch, probably the best that i have ever had and wherever i go, i went to the best bakery in town and ‚Ä¶

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Definitely come here for a full High Tea or just lunch. Or even just a piece of cake and a pot of tea. They have so many tasty tea selections and the food is crazy good. The decorations make you feel like you are in a cozy garden. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Excellent (huge) scone with clotted cream and jam. Very good coffee and very cooperative staff. Definitely worth visiting. They also serve savory stuff.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Such a quaint and cozy brunch spot. Coffee was delicious, baked goods were all fresh and tasty. Service was speedy and friendly. Would definitely return.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great food and a really good atmosphere. A bit of a wait time for groups of more than two. Best soup ever!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Homemade granola, jams, breads and fresh orange juice. Everything organic. Adorable place for breakfast!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very friendly service, delicious and wide selection of food, lively ambiance.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Cozi bar with a really nice staff.

The food is really good. Perfect place to brunch. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: My favorite place for brunch and for breakfast in Amsterdam. Quality of the food is very high and so much better compared to all the other Bakkerswinkel in town and in Rotterdam. Recommended! Great food, pastries and big menu selection. Fresh ingredients and lovely staff!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Amazing scones, easy and quick Service and felt very welcomed. My suggestion: get a scone breakfast and eat it at Sarphatipark!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Fantastic food, cozy place and nice waiters!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Vergaande glorie. Sometimes it is better to stop after your peak. Ordered a cake and croissant for take away. Both very poor. Bad quality unfortunately.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Fantastic breakfast bakery. The bakery focuses on quality foods. Homemade jams and good strong coffee. Freshly squeezed orange juice. A variety of great tasting scones and sourdough breads. I recommend it.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best scones in Holland. Lots of varieties from plain thru sweet and savory.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Fantastic little Cafe, their jams are unique and taste great. Scones or (and?) croissants with jam are all you need but they have lots of other things too. Having been to other places in area this is top of the list.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Inviting breakfast/lunch restaurant with delicious baked goods, generous portions and quality, friendly service.  I‚Äôve been there twice and definitely would return.  Coffees delicious; orange juice fresh.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: All time favourite, lovely owners, good atmosphere and best grilled cheese sandwich w/ salad in town, also beautiful almond madeleines to takeout! üíô

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Amazing breakfast place. Their jams were outstanding! Enjoyed the eggs with bacon. Sandwiches were decent too. Good service. Highly recommended for breakfast or brunch.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Everything we had was very good. Would certainly eat here again. The bread and butter pudding and hot mint tea to drink were nice on a chilly day after a lot of walking.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Cozy little breakfast spot with delicious sandwiches! Didn't feel too touristy in oud-zuid. Try the breakfast sandwich with eggs, bacon, young cheese and tomatoes on toast! Be aware that this place offers communal seating so there's a good chance you'll be sitting next to strangers but everyone was friendly :)

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great breakfast - eggs on sourdough, pot of tea, orange juice, scone and lovely lemon curd and jams. Really good service, too.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great spot for breakfast. Loved their ginger tea, cannel√©s, granola. Scones a tad dry. Chocolate croissant could be more flaky. Superbe service and cosy atmosph√®re.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Their passionfruit curd is simply amazing! So fruity and tart, just can't get enough.  Luckily, they sell jars to take home!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: A croissant, a cappuccino, and amazingly creative homemade jams.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Perfect preparation using top notch ingredients. loved the quiche , tosti, soup and ginger lemonade.  Very warm and friendly service.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Seems like all there are homemade and delicious! The scones and the cruisant we're especially good. Plus fresh orange juice and coffee.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: An amazing scone. The breakfast is great at very reasonnable price. Service is great and with smile. I prefer this place to coffee and coconut.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Was recommended to visit here on my upcoming trip...looked at the website and it's a shame that the items on the English menu are more expensive than the same items on the Dutch menu. I now don't trust this place, I'm sure the food is lovely but I'm not willing to pay double or more just because I can't speak Dutch.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Very very friendly staff, GREAT food and home made custards.
Also cozy atmosphere.
Only thing that hurts are the prices :P

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Well lit, friendly staff and great food. This little brunch place might have been the best part of my trip to Amsterdam.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Cosy, delicious deserts and scone. Also lunch is possible. Small but you can always find a table within 10 minutes or so.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Really good afternoon tea cafe...prices are reasonable and portions are great. Staff was very helpful and explained all menus in English. Would definitely recommend this

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very nice. Went for breakfast staff were very welcoming. Lots of locals which is always a good sign. Would really recommed to anyone

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best scones in town!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
The quiche was amazing ( artichoke , feta and tomatoes) also the chocolate cookies are good .
Service is great !

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Amazing fresh foods and delicious coffee, served in a cozy atmosphere by friendly staff. Highly recommendable!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great afternoon tea with homemade pastries and tasty scones! Very friendly staff.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: the food was amazing, the service was fantastic. i‚Äôll come back when i‚Äôll visit amsterdam again!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Excellent service with super friendly and courteous staff. Food is lovely especially the sandwiches.
Thank you.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very bad experience!  very rude and hostile service!  They should have a sign of NOT Children under 5 year-old allowed!  and the service had a wide room for improvement.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Delicious freshly baked scones

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great Dutch breakfast and a warm welcome. Just what we needed on a wet Amsterdam morning.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Friendly staff, small place good for breakfast not so much choice for take away.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Really liked this Bakkerswinkel until I was told this was not the place for children, despite their being highchairs & toys. Not family friendly.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very cozy, amazing baked goods and friendly staff. The lemon curd was super amazing, I'm salivating just thinking about it

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: We had an amazing salad with avocado and walnuts and a sandwich with salmon. Delicious!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: They have nice breakfast menu and the workers was really friendly.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Really cute caf√©, I reccomend you to take their delicious scones!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great breakfast place and one of the few open on Sundays. Try their scones and cannel√©!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best jam I had in a long time. Feels like home, recommend!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: I love the high tea, but also breakfast and lunch. The scones are to die for.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: What a lovely place to eat breakfast ! Super nice staff and really cute establishment.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great cheesecake, great Cappucino, great staff - great place to have a break from the busy city

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
